original_title: Jon Luke Evans: Maine police officer arrested by ICE agrees to voluntarily leave the country | CNN
article_summary: Maine Police Officer Jon Luke Evans, arrested by ICE for overstaying his visa, has agreed to voluntarily leave the country. The town and police department had previously been informed that Evans was legally authorized to work in the U.S. The dispute between the authorities and the town revolves around the use of the E-Verify program for employment eligibility verification.</s>
